title: How it feels when the enemy Zed kills your carry in every team fight, and keeps making it out alive.

replies.body: who is that guy? he's kind of cute
I've actually done that once or twice.  It was really fun, considering that the enemy team just couldn't kill me that game.

Zed is so easy to peel from and to kill afterwards.

Or maybe it's because I main Lulu support... but either way, it's easy as shit to deal with Zeds; he hardly kills anyone when I'm around.
I laughed and i'm a Zed main. :3
